title: can I add different ringtones for groups
content:
I read that there are no ringtones for labels(groups) but you can add a ringtone to each contact separately.Okay so why is the ringtones name associated with the contact not listed in that contacts info page.Say next to call,text, setup duo,pay or better still with a icon next to the star to tap and open up the ringtone settings?
Instead of all the clicking around!
